content: decrease rounds round 1 *k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before middle of round k2tog k1 repeat from * on second side of magic loop 4 sts decreased round 2 knit all sts repeat both rounds 6 7 8 times until there are 36 38 40 sts total remaining then continue knitting round 1 only 4 times until there are 20 22 24 sts total remaining you should have 10 11 12 sts left on each needle use kitchener stitch and a tapestry needle to sew up the end of the toe finishing weave in and trim all loose ends knit second sock gently hand wash socks in cool water and block for the final step add the duplicate stitching with red as indicated on colorwork charts 1a or 1b and colorwork charts 3a or 3b according to your chosen size 6 mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting colorwork charts colorwork chart 1a sizes small and large 7 mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting colorwork chart 1b size medium 8 mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting colorwork chart 2 all sizes 9 mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting colorwork chart 3a size small 10 mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting colorwork chart 3b sizes medium and large copyright 2023 by emma manos ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/emcrafting / tiktok @emcrafting this pattern is for personal use only 11
